item.title: Weekly Log 9/12/2022
item.description: In order to better document my successes and failures, I have decided to document the journey week by week in the style of

item.title: Four Years of Tears
item.description: In the three decades that the term cybersecurity has been used, there have been a few select events that have come to define the field and it is only in hindsight that one is fully able to analyze the implications and impact of such incidences.

item.title: About
item.description: Sparwol is a private information security and cybersecurity consultant offering a variety of services. In order to effectively address a client’s security needs, a whole-picture view is required.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Send us a message with your details and we’ll be in contact shortly.

item.title: Contact Success
item.description: Thank you for reaching out, we’ll read your message and be in contact as soon as possible.

item.title: Resources
item.description: Books Black Hat Python (Justin Seitz, Tim Arnold) Advanced Penetration Testing (Wil Allsopp) Red Team Field Manual (Ben Clark)

item.title: Services
item.description: Our specialised team has the skill and experience to provide a range of services. The utmost care is taken with all our work.

item.title: Terms
item.description: All information provided is offered for free, for educational purposes, and without guarantee. All resources described are subject to terms given by their respective authors.
